means: (20世纪60 年代从亚洲引进美国的) 软水草

sentence.Network_en: A submersed Old World Plant ( Hydrilla verticillata ) having whorled , lance - shaped leaves and unisexual, solitary, axillary flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 软水草一种生在水中的东半球植物 ( 黑藻黑藻属 ),叶片呈螺纹形、矛 状, 雌雄异株, 花为单生 、 腋生.

hydridoma 杂交瘤, hydrilla 黑藻属, hydrids 杂交后代
hydride 氢化物hydrilla 黑藻hydrocarbon 烃

means.word_mean: 1. submersed plant with whorled lanceolate leaves and solitary axillary flowers; Old World plant naturalized in southern United States and clogging Florida's waterways
